name: Husband
message: The first time I knew she was the one was when she met Moonee. She walked into my apartment, heard a little puppy, and asked if I had a dog. I said yes, I have a puppy and immediately shoved me aside and wrnt one-on-one with his crate. She lost and I had to help her, of course. Once she had him in her arms she didn’t let him go for the rest of the night. That’s when I knew she was the girl for me. Anyone who shows that much love for a puppy she just met is someone pretty special

name: Moonee
message: Mom took me to a field and let me drag her around for a looong time. Think she hurt her arm but it was a looot of fun 🤩

name: Moonee
message: Shared a favorite picture! 📸💕

name: the Architect
message:
BRITTNEY!!! RAMKIS…SANCHO!!!

Ah, whether we are “working” remote, getting Craig’s cookies or finding our way out of an escape room, you have been an amazing addition to our family, and can’t wait for more cottage escapes

Much love and Happy Birthday

name: Elena
message: Trying to stay awake amid the boys playing the Alice and wonderland game. I think we were talking with our eyes closed on the couch 🤣

name: Elena
message: Happiest Birthday to my new sister. While I’m not a seasoned sibling holder (being an only child), you fulfill a childhood wish. Who knew I would get another sister to share life’s next chapters, celebrations, and harder times alongside. I hope your day and month is filled with love and delicious meals. Happy Birthday ♥️✨

message: Happy birthday my beautiful daughter 💗.  My prayer for you today is joy!! I wish joy for you in everything you do may it fill your heart and know that you're loved and cherished...have an amazing day kitten. Love mom❤️

message:
Wishing my sister-in-law (and occasional partner in crime 😉) the happiest day ever. Thanks for being the perfect mix of family and friend (I could serve you for high tea!!) 
Love you and can’t wait to celebrate all the other birthdays 🎉
